sentences.en: ...the Ukrainian Catholic representatives, Metropolitan Volodymyr and Bishop Sofron.
sentences.cn: 乌克兰的天主教代表——弗拉基米尔大主教和索夫龙主教

sentences.en: a metropolitan area of South Australia
sentences.cn: 南澳大利亚的一个都市区

sentences.en: According to its range, planning may be metropolitan ( city ), or regional, or provincial.
sentences.cn: 规划根据其范围的大小, 可以分为都市 ( 城市 ) 规划, 地区性规划, 或省区规划.

sentences.en: At the enchanted metropolitan twilight I felt a haunting loneliness sometimes.
sentences.cn: 在大都市迷人的黄昏时刻,我有时感到一种难以排遣的寂寞.

sentences.en: Chronic injury in metropolitan region is common.
sentences.cn: 大城市地区慢性危害是常见的.

sentences.en: He ordered disclosure of a medical report to the Metropolitan Police in pursuance of an investigation of murder.
sentences.cn: 为配合调查一宗谋杀案，他下令向伦敦警察厅披露一份医疗报告。

sentences.en: I used to love to go to the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
sentences.cn: 我过去很喜欢去大都会美术馆.

sentences.en: Metropolitan buildings become taller than ever.
sentences.cn: 大城市的建筑变得比以前更高.

sentences.en: Metropolitan New York covers 200 square miles.
sentences.cn: 纽约大都市覆盖面积达200平方英里.

sentences.en: Seeing persons, however, do not need a metropolitan to find this key to beauty.
sentences.cn: 而能看见的人却不需要到大都会博物馆去找到这开启美的钥匙.

sentences.en: She caught a trolley - bus, and then went on the Metropolitan underground to the Temple stop.
sentences.cn: 她上了一辆无轨电车, 后来又转乘都市线地下车到潭普尔车站下车.

sentences.en: She was getting in the metropolitan whirl of pleasure.
sentences.cn: 她正投身于这大都市的欢乐的漩涡之中.

sentences.en: The entire metropolitan center possessed a high and mighty air calculated to overawe and abash the common applicant.
sentences.cn: 整个市中心区有着一种高傲的神气,好像故意要让一些前来寻找职业的普通人感到惶恐不安.

sentences.en: The Metropolitan Police say clear-up figures were improved.
sentences.cn: 伦敦警方称破案率在过去有所提高。

sentences.en: This is yet another slur on the integrity of the Metropolitan Police.
sentences.cn: 这是对伦敦市警察局刚正廉明作风的又一次诽谤。

sentences.en: You're talking about shutting down a major metropolitan police force!
sentences.cn: 你现在在说的是解散整个城市的警察.

words.tran_cn: 大城市人；大主教；宗主国的公民

phrases.tran_cn: 大城市区域，大都市区；大都会区
n. 纽约大都会歌剧院

trans.tran_cn: 大都会的，大城市的，宗主国的，大主教教区的
trans.tran_en: relating or belonging to a very large city
a metropolitan is an important priest in the Orthodox and Catholic Churches. He has authority over other priests and is in charge of a particular area.
